arts.ttl: ‘The ball didn’t want to go in’ - Cubarsi frustrated by Betis draw
arts.sum: Pau Cubarsi shared his thoughts on Barcelona’s clash with Real Betis after Saturday’s 1-1 draw in La Liga. I think the second half was very good.

arts.ttl: Flick reveals what he’s told his Barca players after Betis draw
arts.sum: “I’m left with the fact that the team gave everything and tried to score another goal, but it wasn’t to be. It feels like a missed opportunity for Barcelona, although the results do mean the Catalan giants finish the day now four points ahead of Real Madrid.
Real Madrid and Barcelona have pulled away from the chasing pack as we head into gameweek 30 and Alex Wrigley has predictions for all 10 games in LaLiga.
